p: 3. Develop a costing model: data from our electronic prescribing system was used to establish the number of patients, hours of treatment and the volume of gas used in the financial year of 2014/15. This information was essential to calculate the number of cylinder refills, number of consumables required, and the cost of the rental for the machines and cylinders. These data were presented to Finance to highlight potential cost savings for switching delivery systems. Time spent = 36 hours and cost = €2,100.
